synopsis: It adapts the strip Chatty Nordics from the third published volume. On the North American DVD release, it is listed as the forty-ninth episode of World Series.
The countries of the world celebrate Halloween. Also, Italy and Germany reminisce about old times.
China worries about the other nations of the world trying to invade his land and get his opium. America uses a 1942 notebook computer to calculate a route from America to Germany.
